title: [Neuroscience] People that release more of the neurochemical oxytocin are kinder to others and tend to be more satisfied with their lives. In addition, oxytocin release increases with age, showing why, on average, people are more caring as they get older.

[Neuroscience] Scientists have found when compared to people with a stable cardiovascular disease risk, people with an accelerated cardiovascular disease risk had a three to six times greater chance of developing Alzheimer's disease dementia and a three to four times greater risk of developing vascular dementia
